Hi, I'm Pablo 👋

Clean, thoughtful, user-focused developer.

Based in Merida, I am a RPA Developer and UI/UX Specialist passionate about creating seamless web-based workflows optimized for performance.

About Me

Based in Merida, 2+ years of expertise in RPA development. Main focus on robotic process automation and UI/UX. I'm passionate about creating efficient tools and web-based automated workflows, I consider observability something crucial being datadog one of my favorite platforms.

Examples of my work

Fleetwise App

Fleetwise is a modern fleet control app designed for simplicity and accessibility. My role involved developing the frontend user interface, ensuring responsiveness across devices, and implementing clean, scalable CSS. I also collaborated closely with the design team to translate high-fidelity mockups into an engaging and user-friendly experience. The result was an intuitive application that provided essential weather data with minimal clutter, focusing on usability and visual appeal.

Financedu

InFinance is a personal finance management app aimed at streamlining budgeting and financial tracking. For this project, I developed the frontend architecture using modern tools, ensuring smooth interactions and dynamic data visualizations. My contributions included integrating real-time API data, designing reusable components for financial graphs and cards, and optimizing performance for mobile devices. The final product delivered a seamless financial management experience with a focus on clarity and interactivity.

Delivery Platform

Green Courier is a B2B delivery app designed for efficient package tracking and order management. I was responsible for implementing the app's frontend, including map integration for real-time courier tracking and the user dashboard. Working alongside the UX team, I ensured the design remained intuitive and accessible while addressing complex functionality requirements. My involvement also included optimising the app for fast load times and creating reusable components for future scalability.
